Equipment Actions.Action 1: Greatclub, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 15ft, Average Damage: 19 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Fomorian attacks twice with its Greatclub or makes one Greatclub attack and uses Evil Eye once
Other Actions.Action 2: Evil Eye, The Fomorian magically forces a creature it can see within range to make a Charisma saving throw.  The creature takes an Average 27 Psychic damage
Other Actions.Action 3: Curse of the Evil Eye, The Fomorian uses Evil Eye, however if the creature fails the saving throw, it is also cursed with magical deformities.  These deformities halve the creature's speed and has disadvantage on ability checks, saving throws and on Stength and Dexterity based attacks
